name: Pang
description:
No Time For Ballloonin' Around!..... No Time To Shoot the Breeze!....

In fact you've hardly set your feet down in the mighty USSR and it's all action. You sight up your latest and most sophisticated bubble poppin' piece.... but now that bounce bomb has just multiplied!!! Tour the world in the most addictive arcade game of the year from Mitchell Corp. A quick eye and superfast reflexes will give you just a half-chance of a win.... the other half the will come if the bounce goes your way!
